text: 26.53: 2 Kin 6.17; Dan 7.10Ndu khueŋ kaŋgi fhuve? Gu won Ndia ga suangeŋ tuktɨgi, gu vuzvugirga, gu ana suaŋrim, ana won enseri vhɨrve guarira sararim, mbe zɨv nan kurarga. Mben vhɨrve guigira mba 12 thɨgi ntar ga mbui gumgir phɨni vhɨrve guarira kambarigi. 26.53 Mba ntari ga mbui gɨɨtɨvi mba 12 thɨgi phɨni, mbe vhɨrve khaŋ muuŋgi, 6,000.
